metadata.Title: CVE-2014-2668 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Apache CouchDB 1.5.0 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU and memory consumption) via the count parameter to /_uuids.

criterions.comment: couchdb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
